attributes.action: Investigate and prosecute the Internet Watch Foundation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Mr West

We've rejected your petition as it makes a number of serious claims against the Internet Watch Foundation which are impossible for us to verify. It is a matter for the police to investigate whether IWF are breaking the law in any respect.

If you would like to re-submit the petition, please do so but take out any potentially libelous statements. Asking the government 'to provide open and clear regulations for IWF to follow' is fine.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
